p: In the trivalent vaccine recommended by the WHO for use in the influenza season of 2018â€“2019, 2 components were simultaneously replaced: A(H3N2) (A/Singapore/INFIMH-16-0019/2016 strain instead of A/Hong Kong/4801/2014 strain) and B/Victoria-like (B/Colorado/06/2017 strain of the new 1A.1 subclade instead of B/Brisbane/60/2008 strain) [ 27].
